description: Items which are not themselves useful but are instead requirements for crafting or repairs
A synthetic rubber V-belt with steel reinforcement fibers commonly fitted to engines or other industrial equipment.
An improvised belt useful for repairing engines or other industrial equipment when no better alternative is available.
A plastic box containing creped paper used to filter the air supply for combustion engines or other industrial equipment.
An improvised air filter useful for repairing engines or other industrial equipment when no better alternative is available.
A steel can containing filter paper designed for automotive use.
An improvised automotive filter useful for repairing engines or other industrial equipment when no better alternative is available.
A cylindrical heating device designed to be screwed in to a diesel engine to aid starting in cold weather.
A complex mechanical pump capable of achieving high pressures.  Far beyond anything you could reasonably improvise.
A simple cast iron mechanical impeller pump.  It's not good for much of anything on its own.
An electrically-powered device which compresses the gas to increase pressure.  Used in fridges, air conditioners and many other appliances.
A straight pipe with high-tech membrane filter inside it, designed to separate nitrogen from compressed air that is pumped through it.
A small but strong permanent magnet made from alnico alloy, which produces a magnetic field that attracts ferromagnetic materials such as steel.  Useful for crafting.
A section of steel pipe with very thick walls built to contain very high pressure, probably intended to be a part of industrial equipment.

name.str: set of heavy duty pipe fittings
name.str_pl: sets of heavy duty pipe fittings

description: A loose assortment of very thick-walled steel pipe fittings - end caps, pipe junctions, and similar items.  Probably intended to be a part of industrial equipment.
A short section of thick-walled pipe with a valve integrated into it, allowing to regulate the flow of gas or liquid through it.
A short section of thick-walled pipe with a device which shows the internal pressure built into it.
A small electronic device used for measuring high temperatures.
A bulky and very powerful compressor which can produce very high pressure if fitted to a pipe.  Much more powerful than whatever you'd find in common household appliances.
An enormously bulky and heavy steel vessel with thick walls.  Likely meant to be a reaction chamber for industrial processes requiring high pressure.
A rather small steel vessel with thick walls designed to contain high pressure.  Quite heavy for its' size.
A loose assortment of metal pipe fittings - end caps, pipe junctions, and similar items.  They can be used in a variety of projects.

A simple cranking mechanism, consisting of a bent metal arm attached at a right angle to a rotating shaft.  It can be used to convert circular motion into reciprocating motion, or vice versa, by means of muscle power.
